rahamera (mathdrawya ) bhawithayen walakimen athitha anagatha warthamana yana thunkalhima kala yuthu katayuthuwala di waha watahena sulu bawa, sama kal hi mana sihiyen yuthu wima, umathu nowima , gnyanawantha wima, alasa nowima, agnyana no wima, kelatholu no wima, math nowima, pramada no wima, mula no wima, thathi no ganima, ekateka no kirima, eersha no kirima, sathyawadi bawa, kelam no kima, parushawachana no kima, nirarthakawachana no kima, diwarathri mali nowima, kruthagnya wima, masuru no wima, thyagashili wima, silwath wima, ruju wima, krodha no kirima, papayata lajja wima, papayata biya wima, ruju wu (niwaradi ) drushtiyen yuthu wima, mahapragnyayeku wima, nuwanaththeku wima, pandithayeku wima, arthanartha danaganimehi daksha wima yanadi boho aanisansa labe.
